00036 class YardNewItem: public wxWizard
00037 {
00038  public:
00039      YardNewItem(wxWindow* parent, int id = -1, const wxString& title = wxEmptyString, 
00040         const wxBitmap& bitmap = wxNullBitmap, const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition)
00041         :wxWizard(parent, id, title, bitmap, pos) 
00042     {
00043         wxXmlResource::Get()->Load("res/new_inv_wiz_wdr.xrc");
00044     }
00045     
00046     YardInvType& GetItem() { return m_item; }
00047     
00048   private:
00049     YardInvType m_item;      
00050 };

00052 class YardNewItem1: public wxWizardPageSimple
00053 {
00054  public:
00055     YardNewItem1(YardNewItem *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00056     {
00057         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "InvDetailsW");
00058         
00059         m_det_sku = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_SKU")));
00060         m_det_name = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_ITEMNAME")));
00061         m_det_desc = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_DESC")));
00062         m_det_barcode = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_BARCODE")));
00063         m_det_dept = static_cast<wxComboBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_DEPARTMENT")));
00064         m_dep_group = static_cast<wxComboBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_GROUP")));
00065         m_dep_image = static_cast<wxStaticBitmap *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_IMAGE")));
00066         m_dep_vendor = static_cast<wxComboBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_VENDOR")));
00067                   
00068     }
00069 
00070     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00071     {
00072         return true;
00073     }
00074 
00075  private:
00076     YardNewItem * m_parent;
00077     wxTreeCtrl * m_tree;
00078     wxTextCtrl * m_det_sku;
00079     wxTextCtrl * m_det_name;
00080     wxTextCtrl * m_det_desc;
00081     wxTextCtrl * m_det_barcode;
00082     wxComboBox * m_det_dept;
00083     wxComboBox * m_dep_group;
00084     wxStaticBitmap * m_dep_image;
00085     wxComboBox * m_dep_vendor;
00086    
00087

00099         m_price_bulk = static_cast<wxListCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_BULK_TALBE")));
00100         m_price_tax = static_cast<wxComboBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("WID_INV_TAX")));
00101          
00102     }
00103 
00104     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00105     {
00106 
00107         //m_parent->GetEmployee().SetACL(m_position->GetStringSelection().c_str());
00108         return true;
00109     }
00110
